title: Managing Your Cell Phone
body:
Managing Your Cell Phone¶

To connect your cell phone number to the Maha Platform, follow these steps.
This process will require a verification, so make sure your cell phone is accessible before you start.

  1. Click on your profile (a circle with your initials or profile picture) located in the ribbon

  2. Click Manage Account

  3. Click Manage Cell Phone

  4. Enter you cell phone number

  5. Click Next

  6. Enter the 6-digit verification code that has been sent to your cell phone via text message from +1 (607) 364-8199

  7. Click Next

  8. Click Finish
toc: • Managing Your Cell Phone
